content.description:
This boulder is an extension of "Dont Fall Right"

 Start with both hands on the right facing sidepull. There's a good right foothold at the start as well. Proceed straight up into the crux which is a very reachy move.
content.location:
This boulder is along the north side of the stream's path. You will come across a very flat faced boulder with a descent from the trail into a box that seems like it was meant for crash pads (very flat, almost square) On the opposite side of the boulder you can access the chaos roof below. 

 This boulder sits below the Floating Pyramid boulder, and (currently) has graffiti on it that says "Scooter Gang Sean"

content.description: A fun problem on the taller side for NWB. A good warm up.
content.protection: Even with pads, it is difficult to protect this climb.
content.location:
Start in the crack to the left of Chaos Roof. You will be standing next to the start of Chaos Roof. Step up onto the slab and climb the crack to the top.  

  This problem finishes up just to the right of "Don't Fall Right."

content.description: Start the same as Dont Go Right then once you get to the series of small horizontal cracks traverse left across the boulder without using the lip. Dont touch the lip until you get to the vertical crack on Damn Tree.
content.protection: pads and a good spotter for the right side

content.description: Climb the middle of the slab (same as Center Face) starting on a small crimp and the tiered hold about waist height. The right hand gaston above the small undercling rail is off.
content.location: middle of the slab   Same as Center Face.

content.description: Start on opposing undercling side-pulls (Start the same as Go Left) on the right end of the boulder just before the rocky slope and go straight up.
content.protection: pads and good spotter for the right side
content.location: Right most route on the boulder.

content.description: Start matched on the side-pull in front of the tree right next to the rock. Get your feet on and throw for the vertical crack above and follow it to the top-out.
Climb the middle of the slab starting on a small crimp and the tiered hold about waist height. The right hand gaston above the small undercling rail is on.

pathTokens: North Bank - Chaos Roof Area AKA Snowflake Boulder

content.description:
Wooded and slabby.  

  Add pads and a spotter for routes on the right hand side so that you don't tumble into the creek.
